articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Ukraine attacks Shahed drone factory, oil refinery deep inside Russia - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Kyiv carried out the Tatarstan drone strike, according to local media.
articles.content:
Ukrainian media, citing sources in Kyiv's HUR military intelligence agency, reported that Ukraine attacked a Shahed-type drone production factory in Yelabuga. 
HUR employees, granted anonymity as th… [+1601 chars]
